description: Third year mechanical engineering major from Orlando, Florida.  Fall '12 AM class.  I am a leader for Young Life and I like doing outdoor activities.
aspects: My favorite part about Lambda Chi is that it is a brotherhood that encourages individual success.  It has helped me achieve a 4.0 GPA my first two years at tech and encouraged me to get involved on campus.  Overall it has made me a more well rounded individual and provided me friends for life.
involve: Holy Innocents Episcopal School Wyld Life leader
quotes: "He answered, 'Whether he is a sinner I do not know. One thing I do know, that though I was blind, now I see.'"' John 9:25
name: Lee Hagood-James
